mapper.insert: insert into user ( id, login_name, user_name, password, email, telephone, age, dance_age, sex, dance_type, along_team_id, create_time, last_login_time ) values (#{user.id}, #{user.loginName}, #{user.userName}, #{user.password}, #{user.email}, #{user.telephone}, #{user.age}, #{user.danceAge}, #{user.sex}, #{user.danceType}, #{user.alongTeamId}, #{user.createTime} ,#{user.lastLoginTime})
mapper.select: select * from user where login_name = #{user.loginName} and password = #{user.password}
select r.role,r.role_note from role as r join user_role as ur on ur.role_id = r.role_id join user as u on u.id = ur.user_id where u.login_name = #{loginName}
mapper.update: update user set age = #{user.age}, sex = #{user.sex} , email = #{user.email} , dance_age = #{user.danceAge} , dance_type = #{user.danceType} where login_name = #{user.loginName}
mapper.select: select along_team_id from user where id = #{id}

select role from role as r join user_role as ur on r.role_id = ur.role_id join user as u on ur.user_id = u.id where u.id = #{id}
